articles.description: Twitter Blue subscribers on Android can now use the custom navigation perk, which lets users remove up to three tabs from the navigation bar, including Spaces.
articles.content:
Custom navigation has already been available for Twitter Blue users on iOS
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Twitter Blue has finally started letting subscribers on Android customize the apps… [+1130 chars]
